trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Mansfield
There were no other sightings in Mansfield on or around September 23rd 1998
divs: sighting detailsi was living at a house on plesant st. in ashland in 1998.my ex wife was across the street at dairy mart working.i was over at the house by myself doing a study,sitting on the floor.there were bay windows on my right,with vanecian blinds over 4 of them.so i couldnt see out;only slightly along the edge. i saw a bright blue flash which lit the whole room where i was sitting. i looked in the direction of the edge of the 1st blind twards the front right side of the house.what i thought was some one got stoped by the police and their lights were reflecting off the white house next door.so i went back to what i was doing,and the next thing i know im not sitting up any more.im laying on my left side.(i dont remember laying down)i had my head proped up on something(but nothing was aparent)i cant move. in front of me is a being aprox.4 1\2 ft.tall the skin tone was like tobaco spit.it had large liquidy black eyes, no ears,no nose,it had a bunched up collar of black cloth around its neck,(possibly a hood).it had a large head that made a short spiral twards the ears.it hah wrinkles around its mouth,like it was old.it had either a hump back or something was under its tunic i guess youd call it, that came mid way to the back of its head.the air looked liquidy.as i layed on my left side,it was standing with its left side facing tward my head as i was looking up slightly.i never observed it move at all.i sensed there were 3 other beings there also,but i couldnt move to look at them.the next thing i know im sitting up again in my original position and their gone. i thought it looked darker than before. i think i had missing time.i could not think of anything else for 3 days.the feeling i got was very intense.the being was different, but dident look scary.perhapse it was an energy state that made me feel that way.i saw a picture at the mansfield public library that look like this,they called them zata recticulans.
Summary: see flash outside im sitting then laying see being black eyes cant move sense 3 others air liquidy im sitting again their gone
